page.title: 15FACILITIES IN PEATLING
page.content:
{THE COCK INN: THE COCK INN IS SITUATED IN THE MIDDLE OF PEATLING MAGNA. IT IS THE ONLY PUB IN THE VILLAGE. IT IS A VERY OLD BUILDING AS IT WAS BUILT IN 1768.
{THE POST OFFICE: PEATLING MAGNA POST OFFICE IS PART OF HOLLY TREE FARM, IT MAY BE VERY SMALL BUT HAS ALL THE USUAL THINGS IN IT.
PEATLING MAGNA HASN'T ANY SHOPS THE NEAREST ONES ARE AT COUNTESTHORPE WHICH IS ABOUT FIVE MILES AWAY. PEATLING MAGNA IS NINE MILES AWAY FROM LEICESTER.
{THE CHURCH: ALL SAINTS CHURCH IS A 13 CENTURY STRUCTURE. IT HAS A TOWER, SPIRE AND FOUR BELLS.
